title: Ring of the Mage
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|An enchanted sapphire, inset into a ring. It aids the spellcasting of its wearer.}} [[File:Ring_of_the_mage.png]] '''''the ring of the Mage'''''
[[Wizardry]] ego
[[Archmagi]] ego ==Desirability== The '''ring of the Mage'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|1136}} is an excellent [[ring]] for most casters, greatly increasing the wearer's spell success rate and power. Even if you don't use spells as your primary damage source, it can still be nice as a swapout. Characters who do not plan to cast spells at all have no use for this ring. ==History== *Prior to [[0.28]], this ring provided +80 [[willpower]] and +3 [[intelligence]] instead of archmagi. *Prior to [[0.14]], this ring provided +50 [[MR]] instead of +80. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Ring]]
